plot: The fragmented mind of New York native Ryan (Gibrey Allen) as he tries to make sense of the brutal death of his gay best friend back home in rural Jamaica.
title: Excuses for Jeff
plot_es: The fragmented mind of New York native Ryan (Gibrey Allen) as he tries to make sense of the brutal death of his gay best friend back home in rural Jamaica.
plot_en: The fragmented mind of New York native Ryan (Gibrey Allen) as he tries to make sense of the brutal death of his gay best friend back home in rural Jamaica.
